Uses of Package
xxl.core.io.fat

  • Packages that use xxl.core.io.fat 
    Package Description
    xxl.core.io.fat
    This part is an implementation of the FAT12/16/32-filesystem based on raw access.
    xxl.core.io.fat.util
    Contains some utility classes for the fat implementation.
  • Classes in xxl.core.io.fat used by xxl.core.io.fat 
    Class and Description
    BPB
    This class represents the BIOS Parameter Block.
    BPB.DiskSizeToSectorPerCluster
    Structure that contains two values: diskSize and secPerClusVal.
    ClusterChainIterator
    This class iterates over a list of clusters.
    DirectoryDate
    This class is used to exchange date information of a directory entry.
    DirectoryEntryInformation
    This class holds information about a directory entry, like cluster, cluster number, directory entry index and so on.
    DirectoryTime
    This class is used to exchange time information about a directory entry.
    EntriesFilterIterator
    This iterator returns filtered entries of the directory.
    ExtendedFile
    An abstract representation of file and directory pathnames.
    ExtendedRandomAccessFile
    This class has all operations that RandomAccessFile has, but uses our device for this operations.
    FAT
    This class represents the FAT (File Allocation Table) this can be a FAT12, FAT16, or FAT32.
    FATDevice
    This class represents a device like a floppy, partition, disk or something else.
    FSI
    This class implements the FSI (File System Info) Sector Structure and Backup Boot Sector.
  • Classes in xxl.core.io.fat used by xxl.core.io.fat.util 
    Class and Description
    ExtendedFile
    An abstract representation of file and directory pathnames.
